headline: Judge affirms Biden ‘overstepped bounds of authority’ with travel mandates
author: NationalWatch
sentences:
OAN Newsroom
UPDATED 12:48 PM PT – Tuesday, April 19 2022
House Freedom Caucus chairman Scott Perry (R-Pa.) says the judge who ruled against the Biden travel mandate was following the “real science.” One America’s John Hines has more from Washington.

Governor Candidate Barletta Releases Campaign Ad Highlighting Efforts To Fight Failed Dem Policies
